text: The 1923 Washington and Lee Generals football team represented Washington and Lee University during the 1923 college football season. The Generals competed in the Southern Conference (SoCon) and were coached by Jimmy DeHart in his second year as head coach, compiling a 6–2–1 record overall with a 4–0–1 mark in SoCon play. ==Schedule== ==References== Washington and Lee Category:Washington and Lee Generals football seasons Category:Southern Conference football champion seasons Washington and Lee Generals football
title: 1923 Washington and Lee Generals football team
